name: Joshua Cade Barber Prototypes
description:
Prototype 1 Description: Game Overview:

This Game is very simple and is revolved around Change occurring through the Seasons.  Press R to progress to the Next Season.  
As time passes by, the Tree will grow, and each Season brings new shapes and ways that your Mouse's cursor position can interact with the Tree!

Prototype 2 Description: Game Overview:

This Game is based around the concept of Gravity.  You must solve Puzzles using nothing but the mighty Left Click on your Mouse.  
When you left click, it will Spawn a Black Hole which you can use to move and manouveur around the Map, but be careful, for it could suck you in!

Prototype 3 Description: Game Overview:

This Game is based around Racing Against the Clock and getting Revenge on the Boss who always Belittles your efforts to beat him!  
Use the standard [W, A, S, D] Keys to move, Space to Jump and Left Click to Shoot.  Your goal is to kill the Boss before the Timer runs out!
Different Coloured Squares have different Mechanics, so try shooting them, walking into them, and running around like a mad man while you try
to beat the clock!

Prototype 4 Description: Game Overview:

In this Game, you are pitted against each other in a Life or Death PvP XR Deathmatch!  You must use the power of your voice to beat your cunning opponent!
Which, sometimes, could be you, you can VS yourself!  Just get used to a lot of voice command spamming!  
The Voice Commands are: [left, right, up, down, and a sceret one]!  This one requires a special mat to have the Game Scene Projected Upon,
so if you don't have a Star Wars Monopoly Board, I'm afraid you can't play it.  :(
